product_name: Mountain Hardwear Stretch Plasmic Rain Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: The waterproof, breathable Mountain Hardwear Stretch Plasmic Rain Pants deliver comfortable stretch as they keep you dry on almost any outdoor activity. Dry.Q(TM) EVAP stretch polyester fabric accelerates evaporation for breathability and comfort. Partial elastic waist provides a comfortable fit. Articulated knees allow freedom of movement; full-length side zippers aid venting and convenient on/off over boots. Cuff hems on the Mountain Hardwear Stretch Plasmic Rain Pants are partially elastic and feature rip-and-stick tab adjustment.
short_description: The waterproof, breathable Mountain Hardwear Stretch Plasmic Rain Pants deliver comfortable stretch as they keep you dry on almost any outdoor activity.
